pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Toolbox for Conditional Inference Random Forests // Additions to 'party' package : tools for the interpretation of forests (surrogate trees, prototypes, etc.), feature selection (see Gregorutti et al (2017) arXiv:1310.5726, Hapfelmeier and Ulm (2013) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2012.09.020, Altmann et al (2010) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btq134) and parallelized versions of conditional forest and variable importance functions.
